name: Hyun Jung Lee

contacts.value: Seoul National University, Computer Science Department

profile_summary: Research scientist specializing in machine learning and computer vision with a focus on medical image analysis. Experienced in developing deep learning models for healthcare applications and published researcher in top-tier AI conferences. Passionate about bridging the gap between academic research and practical applications in medical AI.

publications.title: Deep Learning Approaches for Automated Medical Image Segmentation in Radiology
Multi-Modal Learning for Early Disease Detection in Medical Imaging
Federated Learning Framework for Privacy-Preserving Healthcare AI
publications.venue: Medical Image Computing and Computer Assisted Intervention (MICCAI)

publications.title: Attention Mechanisms in Medical Image Analysis: A Comprehensive Survey

education.thesis: Advanced Deep Learning Techniques for Medical Image Analysis and Diagnosis
CNN-based Image Classification for Autonomous Systems

experience.title: Senior Research Scientist
bullets: Led development of AI-powered medical imaging solutions for early cancer detection
Collaborated with medical professionals to validate AI models in clinical settings
Published 3 papers in top-tier conferences (ICML, MICCAI, IEEE TMI)
Mentored 5 junior researchers and supervised 2 master's students
experience.supervisor: Dr. Jane Kim, VP of AI Research

experience.title: Research Intern
bullets: Developed novel attention mechanisms for medical image segmentation
Improved model accuracy by 15% on benchmark datasets
Presented findings to senior research team and product stakeholders

experience.title: Graduate Research Assistant
bullets: Conducted research on federated learning for healthcare applications
Developed privacy-preserving algorithms for medical data analysis
Teaching assistant for Machine Learning and Computer Vision courses
Organized weekly research seminars and journal clubs

awards: Google PhD Fellowship in Machine Learning - 2021
